admin.description: Full control over the token (can update all keys)

supply.description: Mint new tokens and burn existing tokens

freeze.description: Freeze and unfreeze token transfers for specific accounts

wipe.description: Wipe tokens from an account (reduce balance to zero)

kyc.description: Grant or revoke KYC status for accounts

pause.description: Pause and unpause all token operations

usage.mint: Use PLATFORM_STABLECOIN_SUPPLY_KEY to mint tokens for wage advances
usage.burn: Use PLATFORM_STABLECOIN_SUPPLY_KEY to burn tokens when needed
usage.freeze: Use PLATFORM_STABLECOIN_FREEZE_KEY to freeze suspicious accounts
usage.wipe: Use PLATFORM_STABLECOIN_WIPE_KEY to remove tokens from frozen accounts
usage.kyc: Use PLATFORM_STABLECOIN_KYC_KEY to grant KYC to verified users

security.warning: KEEP ALL PRIVATE KEYS SECURE AND NEVER COMMIT TO VERSION CONTROL
security.recommendation: Store keys in secure key management system (e.g., AWS KMS, HashiCorp Vault)
security.backup: Create encrypted backups of all keys
